post:
Fliphost has been offering hosting solutions for quite some time now. I am now pleased to announce our latest storage promotion.

Servers come with a selection of minimal templates,  and high storage. Each server uses RAID5 and is located in Choopa's NJ Data center or in CoreXchange Dallas.

Dallas Specs:

E3-1230
8 x 3Tb
Hardware Raid: Megaraid 9266-8i
1Gbps connection

Stock: 

Dallas: Has a large amount of stock and will perform the best
Choopa: Stock is very low and older hardware than Dallas.

All servers will be auto provisioned in Dallas. You may request a move to choopa if stock permits.

1Gbps is only available in Dallas for an additional $2 a month.

**Storage Plans:**

**Storage50**
<pre>
Cores: 1
RAM: 128mb
Storage: 50Gb (RAID 5)
Bandwidth: 50mbit
Price: $16 p/year
</pre>
Signup Link: [HERE](https://sales.fliphost.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=82)

Promocode: 50NPG6I9YL

**Storage100**
<pre>
RAM: 128mb
Cores: 2
Storage: 100Gb (RAID 5)
Bandwidth: 100mbit
Price: $3.00p/m
</pre>
SignUp Link: [HERE](http://sales.fliphost.net/link.php?id=7)

Promocode: 8VO4QMY4B3

**Storage250**:
<pre>
RAM: 256mb
Cores: 2
Storage: 250Gb (RAID 5)
Bandwidth: 100mbit
Price: $6.00 p/m
</pre>
SignUp Link: [HERE](http://sales.fliphost.net/link.php?id=2)

Promocode: B7HYH382IJ

Use the following promocode for 25% the rest of our larger storage plans here:
